title: Strange necromancer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Every dead person gives you a one time vote you can use at any point in the day

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: you keep the votes even if the player is revived. they also have their own vote too.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Execute a player with you counting for all the votes

desc:
Post 4792
'not actually a necromancer;they've been commiting obvious in hindsight voter fraud'
